<<<<<<< HEAD
London undone; or, A reflection upon the late disasterous fire.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by E[llen]. C[otes]. for H[enry]. Eversden, and H[enry]. Brome, London, : 1666.
Verse: "No more historians your surmise recant,". Printer's names from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. In two columns, bordered in black. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
